Europa League
Oleksandria - ASSE: what time and on which TV channel?
Check out which TV channel and what time to watch the Europa League match between AS Saint-Etienne and the Ukrainians from Oleksandria counting for Day 4 of C3.
07 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Antoine Chirat



Harold MoukoudiClub previous: Le HavreTransfer fee: noneIcon Sport



Jean-Eudes Aholou Previous club: AS MonacoTransfer fee: none (ready) Icon Sport



Alpha SissokoClub previous: ClermontTransfer allowance: noneIcon Sport



Yohan CabayeClub previous: without clubTransfer fee: noneIcon Sport



Sergi PalenciaClub previous: FC BarcelonaTransfer allowance: 2 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport



Miguel TraucoClub previous: FlamengoTransfer allowance: 1 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport



Denis BouangaClub previous: N√Æmes OlympiqueTransfer fee: ‚Ç¨ 4.5 M Icon Sport



Ryad BoudebouzClub previous: Betis SevillaTransfer allowance: 3.5 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport



Zaydou Youssouf Previous club: Girondins de BordeauxTransfer allowance: 2 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport

ASSE: all the recruits of the transfer window 2019




The Greens have no choice and must absolutely win on the field of Ukrainians Oleksandria. For now, the St Etienne have only two points in the standings and a new setback would eliminate almost the race for qualification. Find out which TV channel and what time to watch this event.

Oleksandria - ASSE on television




Claude Puel + 9 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

In France, the SFR group has the rights of the Champions League and the Europa League. It is therefore on the RMC Sport channels that are broadcast all meetings of the C3 this season but also the next season pending the call for tenders of UEFA at the end of this year for the next period. This Oleksandria - ASSE is broadcast live from 21:00 hours from the Ksk Nika stadium on RMC Sport 1.
